AD.name: Enabled
AD.description: Enable or disable the node counter job

AD.name: Content Root Path
AD.description: The root path under which pages will be checked (e.g. /content/mysite)

AD.name: Scheduler Cron Expression
AD.description: CRON expression to run the job (e.g. '0 0 0 * * ?' for daily at midnight, '0 0 * * * ?' for every hour, '0 * * * * ?' for every minute)

AD.name: High Complexity Threshold
AD.description: Node count threshold for HIGH complexity (default: 2048). Pages with more nodes than this value are marked as 'high'

AD.name: Medium Complexity Threshold
AD.description: Node count threshold for MEDIUM complexity (default: 1024). Pages with more nodes than this value (but less than high threshold) are marked as 'medium'
